<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (...)                for (...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (c)                   if (c)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     X1 = ...                 X1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   else                     else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     X2 = ...                 X2 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   X3 = phi(X1, X2)         X3 = phi(X1, X2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ... = X3 + 4             X4 = phi(X3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          ... = X4 + 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is still valid LLVM; the extra phi nodes are purely redundant, and will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be trivially eliminated by InstCombine.  The major benefit of this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation is that it makes many other loop optimizations, such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopUnswitching, simpler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For practical purposes, we consider that the use in a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occurs in the respective predecessor block. For more info,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UserBB = PN-&gt;getIncomingBlock(U);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invoke instructions are special in that their result value is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available along their unwind edge. The code below tests to see whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DomBB dominates the value, so adjust DomBB to the normal destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block, which is effectively where the value is first usable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DomBB = InstBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Inv = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add inputs from inside the loop for this PHI. This is valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because &#96;I&#96; dominates &#96;ExitBB&#96; (checked above).  This implies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that every incoming block/edge is dominated by &#96;I&#96; as well,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e. we can add uses of &#96;I&#96; to those incoming edges/append to the incoming</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : PredCache.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prediteratorcache/#aa4997ba4fd2495e1737dcf98457f8419">get</a>(ExitBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember that this phi makes the value alive in this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SSAUpdate.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssaupdater/#af0d1a82b4e629e834c2ed53e5cbe22ef">AddAvailableValue</a>(ExitBB, PN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopSimplify might fail to simplify some loops (e.g. when indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches are involved). In such situations, it might happen that an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit for Loop L1 is the header of a disjoint Loop L2. Thus, when we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// create PHIs in such an exit block, we are also inserting PHIs into L2&#39;s</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can also have uses outside of L2. Remember all PHIs in such situation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as to revisit than later on. FIXME: Remove this if indirectbr support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into LoopSimplify gets improved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;OtherLoop = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(ExitBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!L-&gt;contains(OtherLoop))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;UseToRewrite : UsesToRewrite) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(UseToRewrite-&gt;getUser());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For practical purposes, we consider that the use in a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occurs in the respective predecessor block. For more info,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this use is in an exit block, rewrite to use the newly inserted PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is required for correctness because SSAUpdate doesn&#39;t handle uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the same block.  It assumes the PHI we inserted is at the end of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(UserBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>()) &amp;&amp; <a href="#a07f138d2a84576c85e238a26969e5ff9">isExitBlock</a>(UserBB, ExitBlocks)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we added a single PHI, it must dominate all uses and we can directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rename it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddedPHIs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, do full PHI insertion.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove PHI nodes that did not have any uses rewritten or add them to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHIsToRemove, so the caller can remove them after some additional cleanup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to redo the use&#95;empty() check here, because even if the PHI node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wasn&#39;t used when added to LocalPHIsToRemove, later added PHI nodes can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using it.  This cleanup is not guaranteed to handle trees/cycles of PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nodes that only are used by each other. Such situations has only been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// noticed when the input IR contains unreachable code, and leaving some extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// redundant PHI nodes in such situations is considered a minor problem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHIsToRemove) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN-&gt;use&#95;empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PN-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For every instruction from the worklist, check to see if it has any uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that are outside the current loop.  If so, insert LCSSA PHI nodes and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac1c43bfed9a4937c8f7918ac6fb09c56"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac1c43bfed9a4937c8f7918ac6fb09c56">llvm::formLCSSAForInstructions</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Worklist,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;PHINode &#42;&gt;</a> &#42;PHIsToRemove,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the set of BasicBlocks in the loop &#96;L&#96; dominating at least one exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337" lineLink="#a46b279956ad150f9e6ff57d03e1fe539"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a46b279956ad150f9e6ff57d03e1fe539">computeBlocksDominatingExits</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> ExitBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> &amp;BlocksDominatingExits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We start from the exit blocks, as every block trivially dominates itself</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (not strictly).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> BBWorklist(ExitBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BBWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = BBWorklist.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this is a loop header. If this is the case, we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L.getHeader() == BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, add its immediate predecessor in the dominator tree to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// worklist, unless we visited it already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;IDomBB = DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(BB)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#a453de62c2dadf7b4b8df04e89f6ab4e0">getIDom</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#aab2bf365c9f4b976adc7479576dfd5bb">getBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exit blocks can have an immediate dominator not belonging to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop. For an exit block to be immediately dominated by another block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside the loop, it implies not all paths from that dominator, to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exit block, go through the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |---- A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |     B&lt;--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |     |  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |---&gt; C --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       D</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to avoid use-scanning leveraging dominance informations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a block doesn&#39;t dominate any of the loop exits, the none of the values</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We compute the set of blocks fullfilling the conditions in advance</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// walking the dominator tree upwards until we hit a loop header.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at all the instructions in the loop, checking to see if they have uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outside the loop.  If so, put them into the worklist to rewrite those uses.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already.</span></CodeLine>
